t: I*pn lift up my eyes to you, to*ld you who sit enthroned in heaven.
As*ln the eyes of slaves look to the hand of their master, as*ld the eyes of a female slave look to the hand of her mistress, so*ln our eyes look to the Lord*s our God, till*ld he shows us his mercy.
Have*pn mercy on us, Lord,*s have mercy on us, for*ld we have endured no end of contempt.
We*ln have endured no end of*ld ridicule from the arrogant, of*ld contempt from the proud.
